page.title: 19The Sailing Club
page.content: Our sailing club is in Southwold on the River Blyth. There is a race every Sunday and they have a Spring and August Regatta. Some Saturdays they also have a club night. After sailing people throw you in with your clothes on. They also have teas and lunches. We also have a school sailing club which goes sailing every Wednesday with Mrs Price. Only people who can swim 50 metres in light clothes are allowed to sail with the school. We always wear life jackets and usually sail Wayfarer dinghies. There is a safety boat in case we get into difficulty. Jeremy Taylor
